人それぞれ: (ひとそれぞれ) - to each his own; people differ; different people (have different likes)
人たる道に背く: (ひとたるみちにそむく) - to stray from the path of righteousness
人っ子: (ひとっこ) - (emphatic form of 人)  person; man
人っ子ひとり: (ひとっこひとり) - (in neg. sentences) (not) a soul; (not) a single person
人っ子一人: (ひとっこひとり) - (in neg. sentences) (not) a soul; (not) a single person
人っ子１人: (ひとっこひとり) - (in neg. sentences) (not) a soul; (not) a single person
人でなし: (ひとでなし) - brute; miscreant; ungrateful fellow
人で無し: (ひとでなし) - brute; miscreant; ungrateful fellow
人となり: (ひととなり) - hereditary disposition/temperament/nature; body build
人なれ: (ひとなれ) - being used to people (e.g. of a young child)/being sociable; being used to humans (esp. animals)/being tame
人には添うて見よ馬には乗って見よ: (ひとにはそうてみようまにはのってみよ) - you can't judge someone until you've spent time with them, just like you can't judge a horse until you've ridden it
人に会う: (ひとにあう) - to meet (see) a person
人のいい: (ひとのいい) - of good character; kindhearted; good natured
人のことをいう: (ひとのことをいう) - to find fault with other people rather than oneself; the pot calling the kettle black
人のふり見てわがふり直せ: (ひとのふりみてわがふりなおせ) - One man's fault is another's lesson
人のふり見て我がふり直せ: (ひとのふりみてわがふりなおせ) - One man's fault is another's lesson
人のふんどしで相撲を取る: (ひとのふんどしですもうをとる) - to profit at someone else's expense; to rob Peter to pay Paul; to take risks with other people's money
人の事を言う: (ひとのことをいう) - to find fault with other people rather than oneself; the pot calling the kettle black
人の口: (ひとのくち) - what people say; rumours; public opinion
人の口には戸が立てられない: (ひとのくちにはとがたてられない) - you can't control what people say; you can't stop rumours (rumors)
人の口に戸は立てられず: (ひとのくちにとはたてられず) - People will talk
人の噂も七十五日: (ひとのうわさもななじゅうごにち) - wonder lasts but nine days; gossip lasts just 75 days
人の好む所となる: (ひとのこのむところとなる) - to be liked by people
人の子: (ひとのこ) - child/children; other people's children; the Son of Man/Christ
人の心を読む: (ひとのこころをよむ) - to read a person's thoughts; to guess what a person is thinking
人の意を受ける: (ひとのいをうける) - to comply with a person's wishes
人の意向を当たって見る: (ひとのいこうをあたってみる) - to sound out a person's thoughts
人の振り見て我が振り直せ: (ひとのふりみてわがふりなおせ) - One man's fault is another's lesson
人の為を思う: (ひとのためをおもう) - to wish someone well
人の良い: (ひとのよい) - of good character; kindhearted; good natured
人の蠅を追うより己の蠅を追え: (ひとのはえをおうよりおのれのはえをおえ) - (proverb) take care of yourself before you take care of others; wave off your own flies before you wave off somebody else's flies
人の褌で相撲を取る: (ひとのふんどしですもうをとる) - to profit at someone else's expense; to rob Peter to pay Paul; to take risks with other people's money
人の金玉を握る: (ひとのきんたまをにぎる) - to grab a person by his vulnerable spot; to curry favour with one's superior; to curry favor with one's superior
人の頭に立つ: (ひとのかしらにたつ) - to stand at the head of others
人はパンのみにて生くるものに非ず: (ひとはパンのみにていくるものにあらず) - (proverb) Man shall not live by bread alone
人はパンのみにて生くる者に非ず: (ひとはパンのみにていくるものにあらず) - (proverb) Man shall not live by bread alone
人は一代名は末代: (ひとはいちだいなはまつだい) - Worthy men shall be remembered
人は情け: (ひとはなさけ) - One good turn deserves another
人は見かけによらぬもの: (ひとはみかけによらぬもの) - appearances can be deceiving; don't judge a book by it's cover
人は見掛けに依らぬもの: (ひとはみかけによらぬもの) - appearances can be deceiving; don't judge a book by it's cover
人びと: (ひとびと) - each person; people; men and women; everybody
人べん: (にんべん) - (e.g. left side of 化) kanji "person radical" (radical 9)
人もあろうに: (ひともあろうに) - of all people
人より: (ひとより) - more than most people; more than other people; compared with other people; more than others
人らしい: (ひとらしい) - like a decent person; human
人を人とも思わない: (ひとをひとともおもわない) - disdaining everybody; not caring an ounce about other people's feelings
人を使う: (ひとをつかう) - to take a person in one's service; to employ
人を呪わば穴二つ: (ひとをのろわばあなふたつ) - (proverb) A curse will rebound on yourself as well; Curses, like chickens, come home to roost
人を得る: (ひとをえる) - to employ the right person; to choose somebody with the right qualities
人を怨むより身を怨め: (ひとをうらむよりみをうらめ) - (proverb) it is easier to blame than do better; instead of resenting others, resent yourself
人を死に致す: (ひとをしにいたす) - to cause the death of a person
人を見たら泥棒と思え: (ひとをみたらどろぼうとおもえ) - (proverb) don't trust strangers; always assume the worst (of people)
人を見て法を説く: (にんをみてほうをとく) - to suit one's speech to the audience
人を見て法を説け: (にんをみてほうをとけ) - Suit your speech to the audience
人を見る目: (ひとをみるめ) - an eye for people; the ability to judge character
人を誤る: (ひとをあやまる) - to mislead a person
人を退ける: (ひとをしりぞける) - to keep others away
人を陥れる: (ひとをおとしいれる) - to entrap a person
人を食った: (ひとをくった) - arrogant; insolent; disdainful
人ゲノム解析計画: (ひとゲノムかいせきけいかく) - Human Genome Project
人パピローマウイルス: (ヒトパピローマウイルス) - human papillomavirus; HPV
人一倍: (hitoichibai) - (muito) mais do que outros, excessivamente, extremamente, incomumente
人一倍働く: (ひといちばいはたらく) - to work twice as hard as others
人並: (ひとなみ) - being average (capacity, looks, standard of living); ordinary
人並み: (ひとなみ) - being average (capacity, looks, standard of living); ordinary
人並みに: (ひとなみに) - like others; as much as anyone else
人並み外れた: (ひとなみはずれた) - uncommon; extraordinary (in relation to human characteristics)
人中: (ひとなか) - society; company; the public; the world
人乳頭腫ウイルス: (ひとにゅうとうしゅウイルス) - human papilloma virus; HPV
人事: (ひとごと) - other people's affairs; somebody else's problem
人事ではない: (ひとごとではない) - don't think it's somebody else's problem, it could very well be (have been) yours (mine)
人事を尽くして天命を待つ: (じんじをつくしててんめいをまつ) - (proverb) Man proposes, God disposes; Man does what man can do then awaits the verdict of heaven or fate
人事異動: (じんじいどう) - personnel change; personnel shift; reshuffle; (annual) staff reassignment
人事管理: (じんじかんり) - personnel management; personnel administration
人事考課: (じんじこうか) - (yoji) merit (ability, efficiency) rating; employee performance evaluation
人事行政: (じんじぎょうせい) - personnel administration
人事訴訟: (じんじそしょう) - litigation related to personal status (e.g. divorce actions, etc.)
人事訴訟事件: (じんじそしょうじけん) - litigation related to personal status (e.g. divorce actions, etc.)
人事訴訟手続き法: (じんじそしょうてつづきほう) - Personal Status Actions Procedure Law (e.g. divorce actions, etc.)
人事課長: (じんじかちょう) - head of personnel department
人交り: (ひとまじわり) - association with people
